problem.markdown:
1. Pressure recovery in the case of orificemeter is ------------- that for venturimeter?
() more than (x) less than () equal to () cannot say
2. Coefficient of discharge is the
() ratio of velocity at pipe to the velocity at the orifice or throat () ratio of velocity at the orifice or throat to the velocity at the pipe () ratio of theoretical flow rate to actual flow rate (x) ratio of actual flow rate to theoretical flow rate
3. For an orifice meter,if you plot log( flow rate) vs log(pressure drop),the slope of the straight line is
() 0.2 (x) 0.5 () 5 () 2 4. Orificemeter is -------------------------- type of flowmeter?
() Mass flow () velocity meter (x) variable head () variable area
5. Coefficient of discharge for orificemeter is
() always greater than 1 (x) always less than 1, () can be less than, greater than or equal to 1 () always equal to 1,
problem.p: 1. Pressure recovery in the case of orificemeter is ------------- that for venturimeter?

choicegroup.choice: ratio of velocity at pipe to the velocity at the orifice or throat
ratio of velocity at the orifice or throat to the velocity at the pipe
ratio of theoretical flow rate to actual flow rate
ratio of actual flow rate to theoretical flow rate

problem.p: 3. For an orifice meter,if you plot log( flow rate) vs log(pressure drop),the slope of the straight line is
5. Coefficient of discharge for orificemeter is

choicegroup.choice: can be less than, greater than or equal to 1
